Please go back and select your device / update method again. Частичное обновление системы возможно только в том случае, когда на момент выпуска апдейта у вас уже была установлена последняя версия прошивки.\n\nПолное обновление системы может быть установлено всегда, независимо от установленной на данной момент версии прошивки.\n\nБета обновление прошивки OxygenOs возможно только в том случае, когда вы уже используете Бета версии прошивки. Объяснение вариантов обновления] Выберите ваще устройство и вариант обновления: Присылать мне уведомления, когда: Если какое-либо критическое предупреждение Доступно обновление системы Добавлена поддержка нового устройства Была опубликована новая история ю Ваши настройки автоматически сохраняются. Your settings are still being saved. If this takes too long: Check your network connection, exit the app and start it again. Показывать сообщение в приложении, когда: Есть какое-либо предупреждение или новости Доступно обновление приложения Other options: Advanced mode Tap this button to get more information about the advanced mode. Advanced mode hides the message \"Your system is up to date\", allowing you to download and install all updates, even though they may not be compatible with your device.\n\nThis can be useful when:\n- Updating from a regular version to a beta version\n- Reverting from a beta version to the regular version (don\'t forget to factory reset your device)\n- Reinstalling your current system version. Вариант обновления Отправлять log-файлы разработчику FAQ FAQ Hет соединения. You\'ll need a working connection to view the FAQ page. Добро пожаловать начать приложение Добро пожаловать в Oxygen Updater! Данное приложение позволит вам:\n\n- Получить мгновенный доступ к последним версиям Android для устройств под управлением OxygenOS\n\n- Легко обновить "Rooted" устройство \n\n- Просмотреть что нового в вашей установленной системе\n\n- Читать последние новости о OnePlus и OxygenOS\n\nПроведите влево, чтобы продолжить. Важное замечание: Данное приложение не является официальным приложением OnePlus. Вы используете данное приложение на свой страх и риск. OnePlus и разработчик данного приложения не несут ответственности за нанесение какого-либо вреда вашему устройству данным приложением. \n\nИспользуя данное приложение, вы соглашаетесь с условиями, которые указанными выше.\n\nПроведите влево, чтобы продолжить. Выберите ваще устройство: В большинстве случаев ваше устройство уже выбрано выше. Если нет, выберите ваще устройство выше.\n\nПроведите влево, чтобы продолжить. Выберите метод обновления Обычно, частичное обновление является оптимальным решением, так как оно характеризуется быстрой загрузкой меньших по объему файлов. \n\nК сожалению его нельзя использовать с "Rooted" устройствами. Если у вас "Rooted" устройство, используйте Полное обновление.\n\nЕсли вы используете бета версии прошивок, то выберите \"Community Edition\" обновления. \n\nПроведите влево, чтобы продолжить. Вы готовы! Наслаждайтесь использованием данного приложения!\n\nВы всегда можете изменить настройки приложения. Чтобы сделать это: Нажмите на три точки в правом верхнем углу, после нажмите на \"Настройки\". Устанавливать Checking if your device is rooted… Please allow root access when asked. Unfortunately, you can\'t go back now Preparing installation… Update Installer   Backing up your device. This will take a while! Clearing the cache partition… Done. Your device will restart. Installing the additional ZIP file… Installing the update… Thank you for using Oxygen Updater. If you like this app, please rate it 5 stars at Google Play :-) "Failed to prepare the installation of the update. Did you allow root access?" Backup my device You may customize the installation process by changing the options shown below. Tap on \'Start installation\' to start the installation of the update. Keep my device rooted Reboot after installation Select the root package to install… Start installation Choose your install options Wipe the cache partition What do these options mean? Backup my device:\nWhen you select this option, a backup of your system, apps and settings will be made prior to the installation. Always handy to have, in case something goes horribly wrong. Keep my device rooted:\nWhen you select this option, you may specify a root package which will be installed after the update is installed. This ensures that your device stays rooted. Please note that this root package must be compatible with the NEW OxygenOS version you are going to install! Wipe the cache partition:\nWhen you select this option, the cache partition will be wiped after the update has been installed. This ensures your device performs optimally and also reduces the likelihood of experiencing bugs caused by the installation of the update. Reboot after installation:\nWhen you select this option, your device will automatically reboot back to OxygenOS after the update is installed. Otherwise, your device will stay in Recovery Mode, where you can install additional packages. How do you want to install this update? Automatic installation* Automatic installation image The easiest way to install the update.\nYour device will restart to install the update.\n\n* Requires root access and TWRP recovery. Manual installation Manual installation image Read the install guide to learn how to install the update. You will install the update using the Recovery Mode of your device. A temporary error occurred while preparing the installation of the update. Please try it again. Installation failed Error when installing the update. No changes were made to the software of your device. Try installing the update again. Failed to check if the update was installed successfully. Please open Oxygen Updater to see if the update was installed successfully. A different version of OxygenOS was installed. Don\'t select an OxygenOS update file when choosing a root package under the "Keep my device rooted" option. Installation complete OxygenOS version %1$s has been installed successfully. Clear root package file Choose root package file Select a root package… You may only select a zip file. Please select the right file. Install the update according to the instructions shown in the install guide. Automatic installations have been temporarily disabled due to reported technical issues. Install the update according to the instructions shown in the install guide. Install guide Loading the installation guide … Install guide - %1$d of %2$d Contextual image. Please tap on a lower place on the screen to hear the install guide. Swipe <- -> to navigate between pages. - It\'s recommended to write all steps down, as you\'ll need to power off your device during the installation of the update. Download the update. - Press the Download button to start downloading the update.\n\n- The download progress will appear in the app, and as a notification in your notifications screen.\n\n- When the download has finished, you\'ll see a notification with the text \"Download complete\".\nIf a download error occurred, open the app and try to downloading the update again. If this doesn\'t work, make sure you have a working connection. Otherwise, contact the developer of the app. You can do this by visiting the \"My apps\" section of the Google Play Store. Enter Recovery Mode. - First, power off your device.\n\n- Then, press both the power and the volume down buttons at the same time.\n\n- Your device will now start in Recovery Mode. Wait until you see the recovery menu on your screen. Install the downloaded update. - Within the recovery menu, choose your desired language first. Next, tap on (or use the volume buttons to navigate and the power button to select) \"Install from SD\".\n\n- Next, scroll down using the volume down key until you find a row with the \".zip\" file with the file name shown within the app. (Usually, this is a file starting with \"OnePlusOxygen-\").\n\n- Installation of the update will start automatically. Restart your device. - When the installation of the update is finished, you\'ll be back at the Recovery Menu. Within the recovery menu, tap on \"Reboot\".\n\n- Your device will show its startup screen for a long time during starting up.\n\n- Afterwards, you\'ll see a white message with the title \"Android is upgrading\", while your apps are being optimized. Done. Enjoy the new Oxygen OS version! - After your device has finished optimizing its apps, the update has been successfully installed.\nTo verify this, you can check the current version of your system as following:\n\n- Go to Settings, tap on \"About Phone\", and check the Oxygen OS Version.\n\n- If you like this app, give it 5 stars at Google Play! Close Installation Guide The root package file you specified no longer exists. Please select a new root package above. Select a root package "If you want to keep your device rooted, you'll have to specify a root package above." Объем ОЗУ: Частота процессора: Yстройстве Yстройстве Oбраз yстройстве Версия Модификация OS: Версия Android: Версия OxygenOS: (OTA: %s) Патч безопасности от: серийный номер: SoC: неизвестный вашему устройству: О приложении Предельно эффективный инструмент для обновления прошивок Oxygen OS. This app is written by Arjan Vlek.\n\nThis app is a follow-up on another app of me, called Cyanogen Update Tracker (website). Cyanogen Update Tracker provides similar functionality for Cyanogen OS users.\n\n\nPlease note, this is not an official OnePlus application. \nThe OnePlus name, the OnePlus Logo and OxygenOS are property of OnePlus. \nAndroid, Google, Google Play and the Google Play logo are registered trademarks of Google Inc. \nThis app uses data from OnePlus and OPPO to show update information.\n\nIf you like my app, please rate it on Google play.\n\nRussian translation by: denisd/garry1999 Оценить в Google Play Версия: %1$s New device released! The %1$s is now supported! Open the app to choose this device. Install or update Google Play services to enable push notifications. Доступно обновление %1$s доступен для %2$s! Push notifications Displays all important notifications of the Oxygen Updater app. These include system update notifications and breaking news notifications. Progress notifications Displays all non-important notifications of the Oxygen Updater app. Contains the status indicators shown during downloading. Help (English) Welcome to the help section of Oxygen Updater.\n\nHelp covers the following topics:\n\n• Updating your device\n• Reading the latest news\n• Viewing device information\n• Changing settings\n\nScroll down to browse through the topics. Updating your device When opening the app, you\'ll see if a system update is available. If an update is available, you can install it.\n\nTo start the installation, tap the \"Download\" button (below the update description) to start the download. When the download has finished, the installation screen pops up. If you left the app or the screen didn\'t pop up, tap the \"Install\" button, which is now shown next to the \"Download\" button.\n\nThe install screen will first check if you have a rooted device. If you have a rooted device, grant root permission when asked and choose how you want to install the update. Otherwise, follow the instructions for Manual install.\n\nAutomatic install:\nYou\'ll only have to choose your install options. The default settings are recommended, except that you have to specify the root package which needs to be (re)installed. Select a root package (zip file) using the blue folder button and tap on \"Start install\" to start the installation.\n\nManual install:\nYou\'ll see an installation guide on your screen. Write the instructions down and perform them as stated to install the update. Reading the latest news News is displayed to the left of the update information screen. The most recent items appear on top. Just tap on an item to read it.\nTap the back arrow or press your back key to return to the news items screen. Viewing information about your device You may view some of the specifications of your device using the screen to the right of the update information. This comes in handy when making a support request, during which you might be asked for some of the specifications of your device. Changing settings You can change your settings by tapping the three dots in the top right, following a tap on Settings.\nYou can change the following settings:\n\n• Device and update method\n• Push notifications\n• In app notifications\n• Privacy settings (log uploading).\n\nUse the switches to turn notification / privacy settings on and off. Select a device and / or update method using the dropdown menus shown above the switches. Dropdown menus not visible? Check your Internet connection and open the Settings screen again. Tap on \"Install Guide\" to view how to install this update. Tap on \"Delete\" to permanently delete the file. Press the Back button to close this message. Удалить Hеподдерживаемое устройство It looks like your device is not running Oxygen OS. Please note that you can only install system updates on devices running Oxygen OS. \n\nOther devices, including OnePlus devices running Custom ROMs, are not supported. Don\'t show this warning again доступ "Root" Некоторые варианты обновления не совместимы с "Rooted" устройствами. Oxygen Updater может проверить у вас наличие "Root" доступа и порекомендовать вам подходящий вариант обновления. \n\nЕсли у вас "Rooted" устройство, крайне желательно предоставить "Root" доступ приложению, после закрытие данного диалогового окна. \n\nНет "Root" доступа? Тогда нажмите \"Закрыть\" и продолжите пользоваться данным приложением. The purchase of the ad-free version failed, because an internal error occurred. Please try again in a few minutes.
